docs.lead_paragraph: DEVELOPING the maternal instinct in little girls through their dolls has been a growing fancy, if it could not be called a fad, with women of wealth for the last few years. It is a practice which a mother of moderate means could hardly adopt because of the expense.

headline.main: Mothers of the Future; Maternal Instinct Developed in Children's Play.
